title: PGs for girls near PES EC campus
content:
Can anyone tell me any good pgs that are near the ec campus?

Thanks in advance!!

comments.body:
There's VSR in neeladri road. It's a nice pg but rooms can be a lil congested, but it's location is safe and commutable

Milan is another one I've seen, the rooms are much more spacious. The only problem was that it was inside a narrow street surrounded by men's pg. Wasn't a safe location. But check these out!
